pages.text: A powerful protector of the meek, the Crystalline Golem can dominate the battlefield. A fierce foe to even the hardiest of warriors, they leave plain Iron Golems far behind.$(br2)How to Obtain:$(li)Construct: Build Pattern (flip page)$(li)Augment: Guardian (when HP low)$(li)Spell: Summon Crystalline Golem
